title: Zoot PANTS (Varied Colors) Custom | El Pachuco Zoot Suits
text:
$ 295.00

High Waisted Zoot Suit Pants with a wide knee and a tapered cuff.

OUR ZOOT SUIT PANTS ARE UNISEX – worn by both men and women!

$295.00 pants only

Original Zoot Suit pants can be custom made in any color.

Please allow 6 weeks for these pants to be made. The order will be processed after payment is received.

Video on how to measure To View Sizing movie 
Additional charge for size 50 and up, call for details.

**Please Choose the height and waist measurement from the drop-boxes above.

1. waist (2″ above the belly button) 2. height 3. Color

COLORS: Vary

NOTE: Please don’t forget to measure 2″ above navel for waist size. Thank you!

***Accessories are NOT included with this purchase. Please look at our other items for the shirt, suspenders, chain, shoes and hat.***

5'6, 5'7, 5', 5'1, 5'2, 5'3, 5'4, 5'5, 5'8, 5'9, 5'10, 5'11, 6, 6'1, 6'2

30, 32, 34, 36, 38, 40, 42, 44, 46, 48

brown Herringbone Wool, Brown Pinstripe, Emerald Green, khaki, Lavender, Royal Blue, Turquoise, Black, Black&White-Pinstripe, Blue, Burgundy, Chocolate-Brown, Gray, Pink, Purple, Red, Tan, White, Yellow

There are no reviews yet.

Your email address will not be published.   Required fields are marked  *

Your review  *

Name  *

Email  *

Anthonyburciaga © Copyright 2016. All Rights Reserved.

NOTICE!! **Our STORE LOBBY will be CLOSED on 4th of JULY 7/4/25 and ALSO on 7/11/25 Friday and 7/12/25 Saturday. We will be back for appointments on 7/15/25.**

We are available during the week for appointments. Please call to schedule your appointment at 714-526-3743 or email us at elpachucozootsuits@gmail.com. Thank you! **  Dismiss
